mapper.select: SELECT cm.bd_no, cm_no, cm.employee_id "cmWriter.employeeId", name AS "cmWriter.name", cm_content, cm_date FROM boardcomment cm JOIN employee e ON cm.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN board b ON cm.bd_no = b.bd_no WHERE b.bd_no=#{bdNo} ORDER BY cm_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boardcomment (bd_no,cm_no,employee_id,cm_content) VALUES(#{bdNo},(SELECT NVL(MAX(cm_no), 0)+1 FROM boardcomment WHERE bd_no=#{bdNo}),#{cmWriter.employeeId},#{cmContent})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM boardcomment WHERE bd_no=#{bdNo} AND cm_no=#{cmNo} AND employee_id=#{cmWriter.employeeId}
